underlying_goal: Fix and verify a detection system's polling behavior (preserving expanded step details), run SM2 production check flow (19 items), and ensure today's Phase 1-4,6 test modifications are reflected in the automated check_playwright.py code
friction_detail: Claude did not realize that today's Phase 1-4,6 manual test fixes were not reflected in the automated check_playwright.py until the user explicitly pointed it out multiple times.
brief_summary: User wanted polling-safe UI updates, SM2 production check tests, and Phase 1-4,6 fixes reflected in automated test code; polling fix succeeded but automated test updates were not applied until user repeatedly flagged the gap.
